title: Packing and covering triangles in graphs

lemmas.name: haxell_bound
lemmas.statement: theorem haxell_bound (G : SimpleGraph V) : 23 * triangleCoveringNumber G ≤ 66 * trianglePackingNumber G
lemmas.english: tau <= (66/23) * nu ≈ 2.87 * nu for all graphs
lemmas.proof_technique: Unknown - need to read full paper
lemmas.needs_validation: Need to read full paper for proof technique

lemmas.name: haxell_epsilon
lemmas.statement: lemma haxell_epsilon (G : SimpleGraph V) : ∃ ε > 3/23, triangleCoveringNumber G ≤ (3 - ε) * trianglePackingNumber G
lemmas.english: There exists epsilon > 3/23 such that tau <= (3 - epsilon) * nu
implications: First improvement over trivial tau <= 3*nu bound

key_insight: Best general bound is 66/23 ≈ 2.87, significantly worse than Tuza's 2. Gap hasn't been improved since 1999.
notes: 26 years with no improvement on general bound suggests new techniques needed
